BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application no. 20085255 HKK (N 080244 HKK), pursuant to §3020 of the Charter of the City of New York, concerning the designation (List No.399, LP-2279) by the Landmarks Preservation Commission of the Dumbo historic district, Council District no. 33 & 35.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20085049 SCX, a proposed site for a 515 seat early childhood center  to be generally located at Kings College Place, East 211th Street, East Gun Hill Road and Putnam Place (Block 3356, Lot 36 (portion), Council District no. 11, The Bronx.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: School Construction, Early Childhood Center – School District No. 10, Bronx (20085049SCX)
